# predictedFeatureName

**Instance Property**

The name of the primary prediction feature output description.

## Declaration

```swift
var predictedFeatureName: String? { get }
```

## Accessing prediction names

- **predictedProbabilitiesName**: The name of the feature output description for all probabilities of a prediction.

items.description: The name of the feature output description for all probabilities of a prediction.
items.name: predictedProbabilitiesName
